snippet: Poland will meet a Saturday deadline set by a European court to pay a total of $260,000 in reparations to two suspected terrorists who were interrogated in a secret C.I.A. prison in Poland.
abstract: Poland will pay $260,000 in reparations to Abu Zubaydah and Abd al-Rahim al-Nashiri, meeting deadline set by European court; men are suspected terrorists who were interrogated in secret CIA prison in Poland.
lead_paragraph: Poland will meet a Saturday deadline set by a European court to pay a total of $260,000 in reparations to two suspected terrorists who were interrogated in a secret C.I.A. prison in Poland.

headline.main: Poland: Reparations Deadline to Be Met for 2 Terrorism Suspects Held by C.I.A.
headline.print_headline: Poland: Reparations Deadline to Be Met for 2 Terrorism Suspects Held by C.I.A.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
